properties.title: Pittenweem Community Library and Information Centre

properties.address: St Mary Street, St Andrews, KY16 8LH
properties.description: We know many people are struggling with rising energy bills this winter, and that’s why we are holding these free sessions to give you extra support during the cold months. Enjoy a hot drink and biscuit, and meet other participants while enjoying optional, informal, social activities like table tennis, indoor curling, board games and short exercise activities.

hours._text: Monday ; Tuesday ; Wednesday ; Thursday 2.30pm - 4.30pm; Friday ; Saturday ; Sunday

properties.name: East Sands Leisure Centre

properties.description: You’re welcome to read, surf, and have a blether as well as enjoy board games, or just relax and enjoy a free cuppa.

properties.description: Free Tea/coffee available at all sessions. Free prepared hot food available at Monday Cosy Cafe. Free food at Community Fridge (Thursdays). Free activities / self directed on Wednesdays - Warm Space. Welfare support & advice is available occasionally when partners available to provide input. Signposting is always available in the community centre.

hours._text: Monday 12 noon - 1:30pm Cosy Cafe (free lunch); Tuesday ; Wednesday 2pm - 4pm Social Cafe - Warm Space with free coffee/tea and table games, activities and magazines/papers.; Thursday 1pm - 3pm Community Fridge & Cafe - Community Fridge open + Free Coffee/Tea warm space available.; Friday ; Saturday ; Sunday
